campaign.story:
💡 Why build another social network?
We envision social networks as places for dialogue, for fun, for human relations, for empowerment, for change. Places for good.
Sadly, we found ourselves more and more disappointed and frustrated about what existing ones are turning out to be: giant monetisation platforms with very little care and interest for their best asset: people.

We could probably write a book about everything wrong going on, but chances are if you have an internet or tv connection you have seen it in the news lately. 
So instead, we'll focus on what makes Openbook different than any other social network.
🕊 Honesty
Claiming that you do something is not enough. People should be able to prove it. That's why all of the code for Openbook will be open-source.
This means anyone will be able to check on what we are exactly doing and hold us accountable for it.

Goodbye closed walls!
🙈 Privacy-friendly
This was our initial drive to build Openbook.
We wanted to create a social network where we could chat and share things with our friends and family with the confidence that our privacy was respected and protected.

Openbook will have zero tolerance for the tracking and monitoring of people.
Surf the network with absolute peace of mind! 🏖
💸 A revenue model that supports content creators!
Let's get it out of the way: Our revenue model is not nor ever will be advertisement. 
Instead, it will be based on a digital currency called Tip 🏵.

This currency will be used for a lot of things. Our priority though?
Supporting content creators.

The internet is nothing without content creators and we are committed to finding ways for them to not just make a living but also have a stable income and make profit.
You will be able to Tip them at any given moment, but even better, become their angel and commit to donating certain amount of money to them on a flexible or fixed manner.
In exchange, they will be able to create exclusive content for you which you will receive directly in your feed.
This is just one example of the things possible with Tips 🏵 ! Read more here
🚚 Got another social network? Bring it all with you!
Due to recent advancements in data-portability pushed by the European Union, if you already have a social network you will be able to import your photos, videos, chats and more into Openbook from existing major social networks!
Moving away to another social network has never been easier.
Full disclosure: There's a lot of room to improve on how existing social networks do data portability.
🔒 Secure by design
From day one, we will take malicious practices for granted and take care to minimise or eliminate their impact.
Due to the open-source (see Honest point) nature of our code, we will also do our best to encourage info-sec professionals/enthusiasts to hunt for vulnerabilities. 
While initially we won't be able to afford fancy rewards or large bounties, if we succeed, we won't be shy about them. 

We acknowledge the worth of finding a security vulnerability goes beyond a free t-shirt.
👷 A diverse & experienced team
Our team consists of globally recognised information-security experts, talented software engineers, hackers, seasoned designers, human rights advocates & award winning privacy activists.
We recognise the challenges of building Openbook but most importantly, we are ready to take on them.
💃 Fun & social!
Building a secure version of an existing social network will never be enough to compete with existing social networks. If we want to succeed we must build something unique, something better.
And for this we're looking into build a social network that is actually fun to use and most importantly... wait for it... social *ba dum tss* 🥁.
We have a lot of ideas. For example, a fun and secure way to chat with anyone around the world using animated avatars, new types of content and... oh wait, right, we're not supposed to share these kind of ideas just yet. 

You get the idea, we want to dare to innovate, to break the status quo social networks have been in for the past years.
Even better? We're open for all ideas! We'll create a place where you will be able to submit your idea, vote on other people's ideas and ultimately see it become a reality!
Talk about doing things together.
👩‍🎨 Customisable!
Social networks are all about who we are. Our friends, our family, our memories, our conversations. Nowadays we're all confined to the same silly template and colours of the corporation hosting us. 
We want to change this. We want to make Openbook personal, for it to feel like home, like an extension of yourself.
That's why we'll be making every single piece of Openbook customisable.

P.S. Yes, even our logo.
🌎 And last but most importantly, a project for good.
Tech companies have a huge potential for doing good outside the digital realm.
We want Openbook to be beneficial for everyone, not just to the country that hosts us. That's why, if we succeed, we'll be putting 30% of our profits straight into making the world a better place for everyone, forever.

We're doing this in partnership with FoundersPledge, a non-profit that makes sure every single cent given makes a factual difference.

Education, cash transfers to those in most need, sanitisation, nutrition and disease prevention to name a few of the causes we will be supporting.
🏁 The Kickstarter goal 🏁
Full-disclosure: This campaign is a re-launch. In our previous campaign we set our goal for 100k and made it to 45k. We reduced our minimum viable product, pitched in some of our personal savings and decided to direct every single cent towards getting us through 6 months of full-time software development. No extra-hands, no dedicated team workspace and definitely not enough servers to handle any significant load, but… If we succeed at building a great first version, we go from there.
📱30,000€ | Openbook mobile version! (GOAL MET!)
Chat with your friends
Post photos, videos, gifs and more!
Customise the colours of the social network!
Import your data from boringbook!
🎉 The stretch goals 🎉
We have now made it past our initial Kickstarter goal and we are looking forward to building even more awesome things!
💻 50,000€ | Openbook web version! (GOAL MET!)
All awesomeness of Openbook also available on the web!
🙌 70,000€ | Communities join the scene!
Photography enthusiasts? Childhood friends? Family? Communities are a great way to stay in touch and keep track of a group of people!
Create a community
Join a community
Post to a community
🔮 70,000€+ | More awesomeness & fun awaits!
Once we reach our 50,000 stretch goal we will update this section! 
Some of the things to expect are events, custom emojis and more!

🎁 - Pledge without reward

Seeing Openbook happen is enough reward for you. That's why you want every single cent you pledge to the campaign to be spent towards making Openbook happen. Thank you!

P.S. You can still get your name on founders book and the corresponding Backer badge if you want to!


🎖 The backer badges 🏅
With every pledge you make to the campaign, you're also getting an exclusive founder badge! 

You can also get different ones depending on the amount you pledge.

🎖 Pledge 1€ or more - Openbook Founder Badge

 🏅 Pledge 30€ or more - Openbook Golden Founder Badge
💎 Pledge 50€ or more - Openbook Diamond Founder Badge

🔮 Pledge 80€ or more - Openbook Super Founder Badge

📅 The timeline 
__
|
|- 🏃19th of August 2018 - Beginning Kickstarter campaign
|
|- 🏁6th of September 2018 - End of our Kickstarter campaign
|
|- 👨‍💻6th of October 2018 - Kickstarter funding becomes available. Work, code, test, repeat non stop for 6 months. Constant communication and updates with backers on progress, ideas for features and sneak-peeks.
|
|- 🎁March 2019 - Exclusive early-access for backers to alpha version.
Get feedback, process feedback, do some real-life testing.
|
|- 👯April 2019 - Invite-only beta! Polish the rough edges.
|
|- 🎉May 2019 - World-wide GO-LIVE!
|
__
💸 The budget 💸
Most of us are currently working full-time jobs. We work on Openbook late-nights and weekends.

If we get successfully funded, we will quit our jobs to work on it on a full-time basis. Together with our own personal savings, we will get through our timeline of design, code, test, very and repeat all day, every-day (and probably nights too).



👨‍💻 Who are we? 👩
So, here you have it. The people taking on the challenge, working long nights, weekends and holidays in Openbook, believing in a better and brighter future for social networks as a tool for good.
 Joel Hernandez | Founder & Chief Disruptor
Privacy activist, software engineer, digital designer, open sourcerer, human.
 Jaya Baloo | Operations Sensei
Globally recognized information-security expert, speaker on lawful interception, quantum-computing, counter surveillance and cryptography.
 Phil Zimmermann | Cryptography Wizard & Advisor
Cryptography pioneer, creator of PGP, the most widely used email encryption software in the world, internet hall of fame member, privacy activist.
 Nathalie Lokhorst | Master Catalyst
Master planner, personification of optimism, want to get things done? Call Nathalie.
 Lambrecht Wessels | Media Maestro & conflict analyst
Security and international relations expert, conflict analyst, peace-builder, media researcher & producer, human rights activist.
 Shantanu Tarey | Digital Sorcerer
Pragmatic software engineer with a knack for building great products and experiences, crypto-geek, bot-maker, simplicity advocate.
 Vincent Ruijter | Hacker-in-residence
Ethical hacker, reverse-engineer, exploit developer, info-sec speaker, does not like the word cyber, cyber expert.
Robin Roosdorp | Communication Warrior
Content marketing magician, The Next Web Top 500 young talent, traveler, brand disruptor, all-can-doer.
Bas Roemburg | Senior Concept Exorcist

Advocate of useful and meaningful products, user experience wizard, worked with numerous international brands, researcher, hardware hacker.

👋 And that's it!
Openbook is an ambitious project, we get it. But it's also a much needed one. 

It's time to redefine social networks, to make them a tool that serves for the good of everyone, planet included.

We can't wait to get started but we can only do this with your help.

"It's not everyday you get the chance to possibly change the world for the good, for present and future generations." - Kickstarter Backer

Please, consider supporting us.
_
  🌐 In the news

🇺🇸 TechCrunch | Openbook is the latest dream of a digital life beyond Facebook
🇬🇧 The Guardian | Privacy activists to launch tracking-free rival to Facebook
🇩🇪 Süddeutsche Zeitung | Es besser machen als Zuckerberg
🇰🇷 The Hankyoreh | “이용자 프라이버시 존중”…페북 대안 ‘오픈북’ 나오나 원문보기
🇹🇷 CHIP | Facebook'a Rakip Openbook Geliyor
🇧🇷 CanalTech | Nova rede social pretende derrubar o Facebook com promessa de segurança de dados
🇫🇷 LesEchos | Openbook, le nouveau réseau social qui veut protéger la vie privée des utilisateurs.
We have also been featured in
❤️ Share us on social media ❤️

🧐 Frequently asked questions 🤔
Do you have a fancy office?
Haha no. We have "flexible" offices, also known as cafes and our own apartments.
Where are you based?
We are based in The Netherlands, Europe! 🇪🇺
Whats with the funny job titles?
Well, if we put things like CEO, CISO, COO and else, people immediately assume we're a settled company that will be just fine without backing. 
Will it be decentralised?
Initially it will be built on a centralised manner. This will allow us to focus in innovating in regards to the user experience and functionality product rather than coming up with a brand new behind the scenes technology.
In the future, we’re looking into decentralisation from very specific angles and for different things. Application wise, resiliency and data ownership.
A project we’re keeping an eye on and that shares some of our vision on this is Tim Berners Lee’s MIT Solid project. It’s all about decoupling applications from the data they use.
If the digital currency is such an important part of Openbook, why are you not offering it as a reward?
Offering any kind of money equivalent goes against Kickstarters rewards rules.
Did you re-launch your campaign?
Yes we did. You can read more about this here.
The open-book.org domain is annoying! Remove the dash NOW!
This annoys us too. Sadly, we don't have enough funds to purchase the openbook.com domain. If we get funded, this will be something will be doing and all of the annoyances will be gone! So please, help us get a proper domain!
If I donate and you don't meet your goal, do I get my money back?
Yep! And In fact, the money only leaves your account AFTER the kickstarter campaign ends.
Meaning no goal reached = no money charged.
Cyber-cyber?
Cyber cyber cyber.

We are relaunching our Kickstarter campaign. Click the image to read more.
Do you know who Phil Zimmermann is? He's a cryptography wizard Harry! He created the most widely used email encryption software in the world and he's been fighting for digital freedoms and rights such as privacy for more than 40 years! 😲
Anyways, he's awesome AND he made a short video about Openbook 👇
P.S. He's also our chief cryptography wizard 😎 
P.S. 2: The name of the encryption software is PGP 🤓

campaign.story:
Update 6/13/2018 - You can choose your color now here.
Update 6/5/2018- 1st Stretch Goal unlocked
Update 6/2/2018- Mark flight controller https://kck.st/2JdvjTp
Update 6/1/2018- Max Flying DistanceThe maximum distance when flying with smartphone is 100 meters, as on the page "spec section".(Horizontal 100m) When using the controller the limit is 250m. Once reaching the limit, we have a limit switch on the APP to let users choose if they would like to fly farther. 
Any flying object requires a sense of position in the air. Dropping a GPS module into a drone made for an easy method to assist pilots with steady flight. GPS to the modern drone has been of great benefit to navigation and flight, But is it really the best way?
The GPS cannot function properly among tall buildings. It often fails in electromagnetic environments. We all know the GPS can be imprecise.
Introducing Mark, world’s first drone positioned by Visual Inertial Odometry.
The VIO helps Mark locate itself based on position relative to its surroundings rather than satellites, realizing true autonomous flying.
True Autonomous Flying
Constituted of a fisheye camera (wide-angle situational awareness) and a GPU-based mapping module. It allows users to fly the drone right out of the box with NO NEED for compass calibration.
Learn more about VIO Video1 and Video2.
Voice-controlled Launch
The VIO technology ensures seamless flying from indoors to outdoors
The built-in memory cruise feature can be operated either by hand or via the mobile app, mapping the exact return path for Mark.
A cleaner design packed with more functions.
Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon Platform, this pocket-sized drone can do more with less. 
UNEDITED ACTUAL FOOTAGE  Shot by MARK (Auto-Tracking)
PLAY

Its ability to track subjects automatically, voice-controlled launch and land commands, gesture-triggered photo taking, and an impeccable 4k recording quality, all make Mark a powerful, smart flying experience.
Facial Recognition
 Circular Recording
PLAY

Dynamic Selfie
PLAY

 UNEDITED ACTUAL FOOTAGE Shot by MARK (Dynamic Selfie)
PLAY

Profile Recording
PLAY

Take Mark anywhere you go.
Mark Controller
Anyone can fly Mark via the Mark APP for both iOS and Android
hi@lemorelab.com
  HighGreat is a leading innovative company specializing in R&D and manufacturing of recreational Unmanned Aircraft Vehicle (UAV) with a factory of 13,000 square meters.
HighGreat factory
After accumulating many years of experience in the industry, HighGreat now possesses the capability to perform its own advanced R&D projects, as well as to mass produce high-end drones with revolutionary technology such as MARK. 
Headquartered in Shenzhen China, we have access to the suppliers’ chain management, and all that it takes to build the best possible drone.
Technolgy meets Art, UAV formation by HighGreat 
PLAY

HighGreat is behind the state-of-art drone performance that lit up the sky for Audi A8L China Launch Event.

campaign.story:
Redefining your desktop experience, Panther Alpha is a beautifully designed, tiny all-in-one for your home, office or school. Engineered to be a 4K media center and desktop replacement in one, Panther Alpha is powered by the latest Panther OS (based on Linux) and Android Marshmallow, bringing you endless of possibilities in an affordable, easy to use, tiny package!
Equipped with a 2GHz Quad Core Cortex A53 and 2GB of DDR3 Memory, the Panther Alpha outperforms popular developments boards such as the Raspberry Pi 3 and aims to be not only the most polished ARM powered Linux desktop experience yet but also the most complete Linux experience by tying hardware and software together.
Panther OS is a Linux based operating system designed for Panther Alpha, to help you accomplish more on your computer with less. With Panther OS, you get a familiar, reliable desktop experience that gives you access to your cloud-apps through Google Chromium and thousands of desktops apps such as Libre Office or Gimp (a popular Photoshop alternative) through our application’s store.
Freedom - Our library of thousands of open source applications are completely FREE. You can download and install them easily and they’re yours to keep forever. No registration. No licensing - for home, business, school.
Security - Backdoor viruses, malware, and other exploits are no match for Panther. A 2014 ESET report indicated there to be as many as 400 times the reported threats on Windows as there are on Linux, making the latter the more secure by quite some distance.
Compatibility - Panther OS seamlessly integrates the apps you know and expect from Mac and Microsoft alike. Things like Office compatibility, Exchange support and Google Apps are no afterthought. They’re built-in, along with all your other favourite programs.
Customization - No two Panthers are the same, and your machine is defined by you, just as it should be. You can easily change backgrounds, colors and fonts - even the entire desktop. The way your Alpha looks is entirely up to you. Whether it’s a Windows-inspired taskbar, or a familiar Mac layout, the Linux Desktop is extremely customizable right out of the gate, so you can make it your own from day one. 
Efficiency - Panther OS uses up to 80% less memory than the average desktop computer. What usually takes around 1,000MB RAM after startup, Panther OS does with just 200MB. Even under full load, Panther rocks 17 times less energy compared to the Mac Mini.
We’ve designed Panther Alpha to be a reliable companion, wherever you go. With no moving parts, no fans, all-flash storage, a strong aluminum casing and a power consumption of only 2W to 4W, make the Panther Alpha the most efficient, all-in-one (Linux) desktop computer in the world. All that in a package not much bigger than your wallet.
Let’s put this in perspective: The average desktop uses between 80-260W and runs Windows and other licensed software from at least Microsoft (Office, Antivirus, Photoshop, ..), costing you hundreds, if not thousands in licensing fees and renewal. Panther Alpha on the other hand uses 2W-4W and runs Panther OS, giving you easy access to thousands of free open source applications that rival paid applications such as Microsoft Office and Photoshop, both in quality and usability.
Panther Alpha is a trusty companion for everyone, with at least two major Panther OS releases planned for our very first device and security fixes for up to 4 ½ years after each Panther OS release. Assuming you’re using the device for 5 years, that’s $17.8 per year or around $1.50 per month - less than a coffee.
We’ve taken a look at what our users truly need to stay connected and while Apple has since reduced their latest Macbook Pro to Thunderbolt 3 ports only, with adapters costing up to $40, Panther Alpha still features the real ‘thing’: Gigabit ethernet, HDMI 2.0, 2 x USB, microSD card reader, S/PDIF and the good, old 3.5mm headphone jack. If you’re going wireless, you can rely on 802.11 Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0 and even IR, for presentations or to control navigate your media from the couch.
Hook-up your Panther Alpha with a gorgeous TV, modern display or beamer and output up to 4K. Your eyes, friends and family will be breathless. Even if you’re laboured with a two-ton 1990s display unit, an $8 HDMI to VGA adapter from any back alley hardware store will turn it into the perfect output for your Panther Alpha.
And if the 32GB on-board flash storage isn’t doing it for you, you can easily expand via microSD, USB hard disk or NAS (Network Attached Storage), even shared from another Panther Alpha, for even more space to store your favourite music, photos, and videos.
Panther Alpha might not look like what you’d expect of a desktop computer, but looks can be deceiving. Beneath the gorgeous aluminium casing lies a powerful 2GHz quad-core 64 bit ARM Cortex-A53.
Panther Alpha packs a serious punch. Compared to the much-revered Raspberry Pi 3, it boasts twice the memory and runs around 48% faster. Not to mention that it’s designed with end users in mind. It’s the complete package.
The Alpha also enjoys far more connectivity options than the Intel Compute Stick, including GB LAN and 4K video, giving you considerably more bang for your buck.
In addition, we strive to make Panther Alpha the perfect piece of equipment, whatever your needs. Whether you plan to develop with, on or for the system, use another OS (Linux, Android, Unix) or turn your Alpha in a server, head over to our community and share your ideas.  
 If you’re still looking for stocking fillers, the Panther Alpha makes the perfect Christmas gift for that special someone. All our Kickstarter backers are eligible to receive their very own free digital gift certificate to give away when the big day arrives. At the end of the current campaign, you’ll be able to let us know which model you’d prefer to receive, and whether you’d like us to send out a Christmas gift certificate.
$200,000: If we can hit this goal together, we’ll be able to offer an exclusive aluminium black version of the Panther Alpha. You can select your color preference at the end of this campaign.
In June 2016, we had the idea to turn the Raspberry Pi 3 into a stable computer platform. Our chief goals were to: 
Make Linux more accessible to the novice user 
Educate people on the benefits of open source, especially in regards to security 
Provide a complete, affordable platform 
Meet the needs of the everyday majority and allow them to take back control 
The results were a resounding success, and we began handing out units to friends, family, and business associates to take for a test drive. The Raspberry Pi 3 gave us a good idea of what the platform is capable of, but we needed more power and more memory. We were looking to build a device not only for developers, but also the end-users, and now it was much clearer how to achieve that. 
We continued working on the Pi 3 but maintained the ambition to take it further. We began reaching out to investors and distributors, and soon raised the $12,000 we needed to get started on a platform of our own, and found a manufacturer that could meet the specs we desired. With a few high-quality samples in hand, we hired Aaron Sowry; an Embedded Software Developer with vast ARM and Linux experience. With his help, we were able to initiate the device and begin work on what later became known as ‘Panther OS’.
With your backing, we can continue working on the computing platform of the future and you will get one of the first - your very own, Panther Alpha - in fact, one of the first in history!
The initial release of Panther OS will bring a stable platform to first backers, but allows future updates to be dictated by your feedback. We strive to ensure the continued development of Panther OS, with more meaningful updates designed to enhance your experience.
Our backers will receive a developer kit along with their hardware. With the Panther OS SDK, you’ll get access to the kernel, most of the framework and more to give you the ability to develop, customize and built the future of Linux with us. For example, you can modify the kernel to support your favorite hardware peripherals, and the framework to customize certain features and look and feel of Panther OS.
We have pledges designed to specifically support work on the Amlogic S905: 
Wayland Support 
Mainline Linux Kernel Support 
“Early Access to Panther OS” backers get access to Panther OS beta builds, driver packages, and build script. They can use our work on drivers related to the S905 on their own devices with this chipset or to port other Linux OS distributions to Panther Alpha - you have completely control.
We’re a diverse group of designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs who have spent the last year honing the Panther Alpha into what we believe to be a revolution not only for Linux computing, but the rights of every user in the world today. Here’s the team behind this ambitious plan:
Panther OS, paired with Panther Alpha is our answer to what’s going on in the world: We're giving the power back to the user, with access to thousands of tested, completely free open source applications that don’t compromise on usability but save you real bucks. Powerful tools such as TOR and a built-in VPN client help protect your privacy online and the sensible, pre-configured Firewall and non-logging DNS shield you from hacking and hijacking. The portable design allows you take Panther Alpha everywhere, to use as your desktop, as a server or hooked-up to the TV, to serve your media.
We’ve taken away the headaches Linux can cause by providing a unified platform of hardware and software with integrated updates. Panther OS gives the power to choose what you share back to you: no mandatory sign-ups, secure software, and built-in tools to protect your privacy that are often left inaccessible to novices. We make computing much more efficient, with a highly-optimized OS that serves the majority of users. Your PC simply doesn’t need to be any bigger, nor does it need to be more expensive. The complete Panther platform will set you back no more than $100 with zero ongoing costs and even significant reductions to your energy bills.
The future looks bright. Following the conclusion of our Kickstarter campaign, we plan to launch Panther Alpha on Amazon and make it readily available to distributors worldwide. We’ll continue to perfect Panther OS with new point releases annually and full releases every two years. To subsidize new Panther OS point releases, we’ll manufacture more powerful ARM-based hardware, always with three key points in mind: lower energy use, affordability, and stability.
Our ultimate goal is to make Panther Alpha the recognized computing platform to meet the needs of the everyday user, and increase our reach which will result in further developer support and community benefits. Your support is not only a vote to make open source software more secure, more private, and more efficient, but also for your own freedom to use your computer however you please.
Let’s get the message out there! We want to put the Panther Alpha into the hands of ordinary computer users that stand to benefit from increased privacy, smarter energy consumption, and reduced operating costs. Share our campaign on Facebook and help us make Panther the go-to desktop PC for everyday use. Thanks for your support!

campaign.story:
I had no idea when I set out to create a beautiful place for my favourite pens to rest on that others would be blown away by my creation.
Sometimes I look at my work space and just have to have a tidy up... make myself appear more organised... and create space so that productivity soars.
I would take a look at my desk, pens, paper all over the place ... don't get me wrong I knew where everything was ... but I'm just saying there were times when I was looking at disorganised chaos.
My idea for the Pen Rest was born out of the need to bring order from the chaos I faced on my desk. Such beautiful pens out of sight or under piles of papers was certainly not the answer.
The Pen Rest brings that order. It takes up no room, really... it stacks vertically.
I looked high and low for the perfect, most beautiful totem, desk art for pens I could find... there was just nothing out there! I had created the Worlds FIRST vertical stackable modular Pen Rest.
Pens are precision instruments with billions in use worldwide. Most are kept in a drawer, a mug, or under a pile of paper.
I love pens of quality, Mont Blanc, Cross, Shaeffer and others to name but a few. To many people they are very desirable, as they offer confidence to the user, portray their image, personality, and have a character all of their own.
There are certainly pen holders available and even desk accessories, but none that I ever found could do justice by showing off high quality, often high priced fountain pens, roller ball and mechanical pencils that are so carefully made, detailed often with unique features and designs.
Perhaps I'm a perfectionist!
The Pen Rest had to have the following features for me...
It must be a solid object with weight that stopped it sliding about It needed a delicate shelf to place my pen horizontal on it. Visually appealing I wanted to be able to admire my pens A Modular Stackable design I have no idea how many pens I might have now or in the future so I wanted to be able to build on my Pen Rest and keep its aesthetic appeal.
A brief Background to my design idea..
I believe a writing instrument should be seen ... clearly and not hidden away.
I wanted a modular stand too ... one that you could add to as and when you felt like it.
The design had to be practical and yet smooth, with rounded edges.
I was particularly keen that the block should give the appearance of floating and so the chamfered edges give that illusion.
Making the block vertical meant little footprint was being taken up. The actual area taken up on a desk is just 60mm x 45mm and yet you can stack as many pens as you like.
A critical part of the design was to create a centre of gravity that did not change even if you stacked a load of pens.
This is because, the weight of each block is 227g, plus the weight of the top of 31g creates a paper weight effect ... a dead weight. As the pens added weigh less than the block... and the centre of gravity is about 20mm from the back of the block, the Pen Rest does not find itself tipping over.
Once the CAD drawings were completed I set about getting the right manufacturer and creating prototypes.
Honestly when I tell you they are old school ... think back old films 1920's! But their workshops are so high tech that they receive work from highly sensitive customers.
These guys will be machining the Pen Rest to the absolute finest degree and tolerance that I have ever seen. They manufacture parts for atomic plants and the aircraft industry.
You'll be so impressed when you get your Pen Rest.
Once the parts are made they go through a variety of processes polishing, sand blasting and anodising before they are complete.
This is a very time consuming process that cannot be cut short. To get the highest quality finish every time each Pen Rest is individually cut.
Stackable, Modular and Practical - "The Pen Rest"
The Pen Rest stacked using three blocks and one top (also a great place to display your ink). The Pen Rest is beautifully shaped to reflect the curves of nature and lovingly display your pens.
The silver anodised colour matches Apple Macs very well.
Quotes from a few people that have seen a sneak preview
"as a Mechanical Engineer I was thrilled with what you have done. The design and finishing of the pen rest looks fantastic." Thomas Tan www.onfountainpens.com
"The Pen Rest is a great idea as too many deserving pens end up being tucked away without being appreciated the way they should. I hope David will reach the 'soft cover' stretch goal." - Matthias Meckel Bleistift.memm.de
"I like it. I think its a neat idea and design" Coy - Root Designs R&D
"The rest itself is certainly quite aesthetically pleasing, and the anodized aluminum would make it quite enticing as desk top art. Stackability is a big plus - after all, who has only one pen inked at a time? :-)” Ken Cavers kcavers.blogspot.ca
“I love the design and concept. Very minimalistic and creative” Mark Anthony - Creator of the LYPEN
I can manufacture the blocks in Gold, Silver or any other anodised colour. If there is interest in other colours during the campaign I will add other colour options.
The Pen Rest is unique because it is stackable.
Each Pen Rest has a 45mm sill that gently balances your pen in the middle so that it is easily accessible but most importantly can be seen in all its glory.
The unique sill on which the pen rests on is recessed slightly to allow for the various diameters often attributable to different designs.
The gap between each pen is sufficient to pick up a pen without knocking off the others from the Pen Rest.
Each Pen Rest is manufactured from the high grade materials available. Our first run will be in aluminium using the latest milling and CNC machining techniques. However, stretch goals include the Pen Rest in Stainless Steel, Copper, and 24K Gold Plate.
Because of the weight of each Pen Rest, it can be used as a paper weight, but unusually can be stacked as high as you like.
Each block contains a unique tongue and groove allowing the interlocking of the blocks, so that the lines flow smoothly together.
3D print shows interlocking and feasibility 3D print shows interlocking and feasibility The chamfers on its edges give a floating appearance at the bottom and a gentle smoothness to edges removing any risk of scratches to your precious pens.
I believe that your favourite pens should not end up in a mug, or just tossed to one side on the desk. They deserve better than this.
They need a home, naturally accessible and solid enough to not move.
Every order will receive a free pen. It has the weight and feel of a quality pen and stylish looks.
I have been looking at protecting the shelf as some feedback from Pen Bloggers have suggested that some additional protection may be required to prevent any chance of marks to pens.... even though the surface is exceptional smooth and the pen only rests on the outer edges.
So every order will receive a soft felt cover for the sill with every block sold 
Timeline
Kickstarter ends In November 2016.
Orders will be dispatched by 12th December 2016 latest in time for Christmas.

campaign.story:
PLAY

We have been developing products for customers for over 6 years, some we have put on Kickstarter and others go direct to market. We are confident that we can bring the Memory pen to market with your support! We love our supporters and value your feedback. You will be helping us to define the end product appearances and its features.  
We will be MFi approved with the memory Pen
  Simply plug in the Memory Pen and start downloading your images and videos.
Running out of Memory, don't you hate that? You have an event to go to and want to shoot some memorable images and your device is full of images so you no longer have room. Wouldn't you like a low cost secure portable device that fits in a pocket, backpack and purse to download these images and clear space? We did too, so we created the memory pen in 64 and 128Gb versions for IOS and micro USB devices.
See what others are saying! 
"It's something that business managers and entrepreneurs are going to want immediately"
    Journalists, medical record keepers, and especially creative types like writers and photographers, are going to love this new wrinkle in mobile device technology.”
      John Nadeau interviews Andreas Haase
  Packaging sample with IOS and micro USB versions
Raptor Creative has created the Human Technology Products brand name to bring you cool CE products. We value Kickstarter and the feedback it supplies us. We will be using the funds to move the Memory Pen into production for Holiday delivery. We know that your support is important to us and we are ready to deliver. 
In iOS & micro USB versions
Memory Pen was designed to give you the customer the ability to down load your image and video files securely and quickly. This results in freed up space on your iOS or Micro USB device.  Our application software is still undergoing some final tweaks so that your files will be secure on the Memory Pen. the Memory pen is a 3 in one device so you don't need to carry too many things. First you have 64 to 128Gb of space to fill, then there is the stylus for using your tablets and touch screen devices and if you ever need to use a ball pen for writing down messages, you have that too!
Memory Pen with Micro USB for Android Devices.
We will be offering the Memory Pen in 4 color selections and 2 connector types. Once in production we will offer more choices going forward.
Right now you need your support to get this product to market. The tooling is completed and the boards are created. A couple tweaks to the software and we are ready to ship in 60 days.  
Pocket clip with Human Technology Logo
  Plastic molded parts sample
  Preparing the tooling for the plastic parts
Our team is comprised of seasoned award winning industrial designers, mechanical engineers, electrical engineers, sourcing experts and marketing sales. campaign.story:
Much has been published about using data science and analytics for the creation of actionable business intelligence (BI). Yet one key aspect has been generally ignored: the art of introducing the new data science paradigm to legacy enterprises. This is something that requires far more than just a shift in technology. It also requires a shift in corporate culture, sensibilities, and priorities.
Written by leading industry consultant Lars Nielsen, Change Management for Data Science provides proven tools for successfully transforming legacy enterprises into true data-driven environments, and gives managers the vital information they need to avoid common pitfalls in this transition. The book is in the last stages of development under the editorial supervision of Edward Renehan, Managing Director of New Street Communications and longtime Director of Computer Publishing Programs for Macmillan.
The book's INTRODUCTION:
Teamwork is the ability to work together toward a common vision. The ability to direct individual accomplishments toward organizational objectives. It is the fuel that allows common people to attain uncommon results. - Andrew Carnegie
It's not so much that we're afraid of change or so in love with the old ways, but it's that place in between that we fear. … It's like being between trapezes. It's Linus when his blanket is in the dryer. There's nothing to hold on to. - Marilyn Ferguson, Futurist
Change is scary. Change is threatening. Change is annoying. Change is work. But change is also exciting, invigorating, renewing, and refreshing. Change is the evolution, growth, and expansion of horizons. Change is the “creative destruction” of what has gone before to make way for better, smarter techniques, tools, and technologies. New thinking.
What's the biological alternative to evolution? You guessed it. Extinction. Organizational survival means organizational change. And there's no more important business skill than knowing how to innovate and manage this change.
I've written Change Management for Data Science with the single intention of arming you with the knowledge and tools necessary to introduce the most draconian changes to hit many a workplace in decades: the parallel revolutions of Big Data, Data Science, and Analytics.
In an age when information is everything, or very nearly everything, the flood of the constantly-flowing tsunami of of Big Data has drastically redefined the terrain of countless long-accepted business models and organizational practices.
It isn't pretty out there. Anciently established roles are being thrown into states of flux, and traditional chains of authority disrupted. Power is changing hands. Veterans feel demeaned, and some become disgruntled. Experience – once respected – has become a suspect thing: an artifact from a prior, antique time; a propeller in the era of the jet engine.
The literati among us might be reminded of a line from W.B. Yeats: “Things fall apart; the centre cannot hold; Mere anarchy is loosed ...”
But the “centre” can and must hold. Anarchy is not an option.
It is key for us to make sure that uncertainty among veterans is minimized, disorder avoided, and the threat of chaos stopped in its tracks. It is essential for us to make sure that new shoes do not unduly step on old toes. And it is vital for us to take a situation ripe with potential for rivalries and transform it into an opportunity for building a more sustainable, effective, and profitable team.
We must enable all players to understand and buy into the vision of a data-driven workplace: a workplace where professionals acquire, interpret, and leverage data in order to maximize efficiencies, iterate and create new products and services, and otherwise successfully navigate the emerging and constantly changing competitive landscape.
In this effort, we must come to understand the importance of the “democratization” of data. Granular and key metrics data, once defined, should be shared by all decision makers in the organization, not just amongst the data science team. The data science team should artfully propose conclusions, but not impose them. Conclusions should be jointly arrived at, and should be the result of merging data science results with the experiential knowledge of line-managers and other key professionals.
As well, all appropriate professionals – not just data scientists – should be armed with the tools, training, and permissions to make their own queries into the firm's data store, whether this be Hadoop-based or otherwise configured.
As you'll see in the following chapters, the importance of cooperation and coordination between traditional and non-traditional players cannot be overemphasized. The most important task we face is to marshal and orchestrate this cooperation and coordination, and make it blossom into productive results for the entire enterprise.
Vince Lombardi once commented: Individual commitment to a group effort – that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
The “Quants” with all their metrics will hold a key position on your new team, but not the only position. It is important that the players in the field respect the work of the pitcher, but equally important that they know the pitcher respects them and understands their role as being vital - especially since several of the outfielders were once pitchers.
With that in mind, let us proceed ...
About the Author
Based in Amsterdam, Lars Nielsen has more than three decades of experience consulting for such firms as IBM, CBS, Amgen, Intel, and the Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS). His books include the bestsellers A Simple Introduction to Data Science, What Every Manager Should Know About Data Science, and Computing: A Business History, of which none other than the late Andy Grove (co-founder and longtime Chairman of Intel) said: "Nielsen provides a most excellent and understandable narrative of a complex history. Well done."
Table of Contents
Introduction
Building an Analytics-Driven Culture: An Overview
Understanding The Life Cycles of Organizations
Overcoming Skepticism In Leadership
Debunking Common Myths and Urban Legends
Generating “Buy-In” from Staff
Respecting the Grief of Those “In Mourning”
Moving Players About the Field
Navigating The “Middle Ground”
The “Start of the Beginning”
The Organic Data Driven Enterprise
Deciding Where to Place Data Science Teams in the Organization
Chief Data Officer: One Part Vice Principal, One Part Evangelist
Raising Unicorns: Choosing, Recruiting, and Keeping Top-Notch Data Science Talent
The Importance of “Design Thinking”
Understanding That Change That Never Ends
The Role of the Leader in Encouraging – and Enabling - Change
Appendices

The funding we are looking for now will finance last phases: design and implementation of eBook, design of pages and cover for the paper edition, and (most expensively) the production of the audiobook, which will likely run to more than seven hours of listening.

campaign.story:
PLAY

Everyone has an opinion, from fashion to religion, from politics to civil rights. This is the YouTube generation, and it's important that communication be clear, concise, and generate a real connection with the viewer. So many blogs are shot and loosely edited together, and they don't have to be. With a prompter that is voice activated (for iOS), or speed controlled (android), video creators can now create more dynamic video with a true eye-to-eye experience.
Also, actors often have to do commercial shoots involving a prompter script, as do politicians, priests, and political pundits. It's important to have a device that can record the speaker, while also allowing for prompting. Plus, by sliding the prompter off-center, actors can read left or right of cam, doing video based auditions of lengthy roles.
What if there was a soldier, Sgt. GoodDad, and he wanted to read bedtime stories for his/her child without having the books to carry? He could get the script emailed, and RECORD bedtime stores for his child to watch on Youtube privately. And make that eye-to-eye connection with the camera, when he can't be face to face.
An interrotron is a device where two people have a discussion and it is recorded for emotional and psychiatric discussion. Here, you can do a 'facetime' between two mobile devices, while recording the emotional expressions on the laptop. 
Share now please!
 Benefits & Features:
• Optical teleprompter glass ensures clarity for the best video quality
• Heavy duty weatherproof case protects your Micro 750 during transport
• Lighting can be rotated in/out for a dimming effect
• Modification ability allows for shooting with DSLR's
• Actors can open the rear panel, slide off-center, and shoot web based auditoins.
• YouTuber's can create better videos with the same tech from expensive broadcast prompters.
• Ports for chargers and/or microphones
• Compact size
• Works best with iPhone®/iPad® but also works with android software.
Who this is for:
If you EVER are going to create an online video, you should back this project. According to YouTube, 1 out of 3 people connected to the internet have uploaded a video to YouTube. Not to mention all the CEO Messages, HR Videos, Acoustic Jams, Priest Sermons, College Entrance Videos, Video Game Blogs, and even Political Candidates.
For the Troops:
We were hoping that soldiers overseas would read bedtime stories right into the camera, and upload those videos to YouTube so their children back home can have video bedtime stories with eye-to-eye contact. Just drop the story onto a Google Drive, or DropBox, and the script uploads with ease to most mobile prompting software. (Featured here is PromptSmart for iPhone)
Stretch Goal:
If we break $60,000 we will include a lens cleaning cloth for the glass. We will also include an additional laser cut 16:9 rear matte-board that can be swapped out for DSLR's. This way you won't have to cover the rear with a black cloth on the DSLR modification, you can just slide the camera up against the cut matte-board in the down position. We will also put some Tompter stickers in the package too, because everyone loves stickers.
About the lighting:
We have included two USB 2.0 light sticks that are hooked to a 'Y' cable so you can plug them into most laptops. Some laptops don't have a USB, but that's ok, there is those USB wall plugs, and USB batteries that can power the lights. They are for you to experiment. One idea is to rotate the light inward, effectively blocking some of it (dimming on the fly). So, we encourage you to make your own videos, and share them with Tompter. we would love to see what you created with the Tompter Micro 750! Show us your videos, auditions and more!
Non-US shipping:
Non-US shipping is about $90. I wish I could get it lower because I know so many of my fans of my other custom teleprompter products reside in other countries. If I get emails here for a particular country, I don't mind opening it up here for you to back this project! Just understand it's about $90 to ship it. I get a break on two. If I ship two, it's $115... so it's much better to back in pairs.
New side design with charging hole:
New charging/mic cable hole added to the design!
  Here is a sample of laser engraving for large orders!
  ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
Disclaimer:
Hardware only. Software is available for Android and iOs devices through third parties, and may be subject to an additional purchase outside of Kickstarter. Not responsible for any issues or damage from those apps.
Items shown in the "build" section of the long video are not included and are currently not for sale/purchase through Tompter or Kickstarter. They are ideas for the consumer to take it upon themselves to develop their own solutions. Any modifications are at the Owner's risk. 
These have been built and tested on a 2010 Macbook Pro i7. At no point during the filming or in our own excessive use did any damage occur to the laptop screen due to pressure or the daily use of attaching/unattaching the prompter. While we saw no such damage of any kind, Tompter is unable to test every computer, or every monitor, so please use at your own risk.

campaign.story:
The MUV app controls your MUV via a BlueTooth link, and consists of two core buttons
MUV features 4 functions
Auto Self Tracking
360 Panorama and Spherical image capture
+ Custom
MUV Pro features 3 more functions
Time Lapse movement
WiFi enabled Internet remote control
+ Custom
The custom button is a fantastic way to store and use your favorite function. We are so excited at the possibilities and creative ideas that can be shared by makers and coders from all corners.

Arduino based update-able software
In its core, the MUV has the beating heart of an Arduino.
We have created unique software that gives the MUV its function, however the MUV is limitless with the imagination of the maker/coder community.
Our web site will have updates of coders from all walks of life with their creativity input into what functions the MUV can have.
From time lapse video and the included 360 degree spherical scene capture, the sky is the limit to what the MUV will do in the near and distant future.
  The Tags...
The tags work emitting a particular and narrow wavelength of infrared light, and the MUV only looks for the tag. The finest quality polarization and wavelength filters are used for the MUV to lock into the tag and ignore just about every other form of interference.
The mini-tag is designed for use around the home or office with a 10m range, and a small and clean profile an undergarment magnetic clip not imposing on your fashionable outfit.
Perfect for watching your favorite shows whilst your hands are full, video calls from friends and family, recording youtube videos with close-ups in mind.
Just tapping the tag sends a bluetooth signal to your smartphone that starts recording, or answers incoming calls. With a 5 hour rechargeable battery life-cycle, it packs plenty of power in a small biscuit sized package.
The maxi-tag is for high performance use. Perfect for recording fast paced and long shots of up to 20m, emitting a higher intensity and area of IR light.
The battery life is 3 hours and just like the mini-tag, rechargeable by the MUV.
Fitting comfortably around your arm, or clipping onto your belt, being the size of a computer mouse, we are sure that the kickstarter community will find more creative ways of using the tags.
 BlueTooth Connectivity
Don't miss a thing, just tap the tag to start recording, or to answer calls. The BlueTooth featured tags connect to any device sharing the technology.
 Future Proof
Enjoy the MUV long into the future, built to last with the highest quality stainless steel bearings and replaceable rechargeable batteries.
New updated smartphones and GoPros will clip straight in. The MUV loves new technologies and will work with anything you clip onto it.
The MUV is powered by an Arduino, and the software will be released at the end of our KickStarter campaign. With the provision of a hackers port, your imagination is the only limit to what you can do with the MUV.
We will also be setting up a forum with the smartest people from all over the world collaborating to post up some of the most creative functions built into the codes.
Functions like time lapse video will also be posted by us.
Auto Tracking
PLAY

 Powerful
The MUV recharges in an hour for 5 to 8 hours of continuous use, enough for any anniversary or birthday party, making those unexpected special moments unforgettable.
The MUV also recharges your smartphone, GoPro, the tags or anything else that is USB chargeable.
Share the Love
 KickStarter is all about sharing and community. Share this projects with friends family on your facebook, instagram, snapchat and twitter. The best way to get the word out is by word of mouth.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
All the hard work is done, the proof of concept is a success. Only aesthetic improvements with the tags are required, and with fine tuning and tweaking we will achieve silky smooth movement. Thats it!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
-Missing your lovely pets at home so much while you are away?
-Wanting to check on your kitchen faucets, oven switch and office lights as soon as you drive away from your home?  
-Asking to join a group discussion while you are away from your office?
-Trying to bring the rich learning environment of a classroom to a homebound or hospitalized student?
-Being ignored unintentionally by your colleagues in many day-to-day hallway conversations just because you are home-based employee?
  PadBot T1 is a Micro Virtual + Independent Telepresence Robot. Having your own PadBot means you can be free to roam around anywhere without having to be tied to the place while you are needed. It can be in your office, classroom, home, or even the patient room. The unlimited opportunities only come from the ultimate PadBot T1.
PadBot T1 is capable of video chatting, remote controlling, phone charging and crawler moving.
It only takes one click to bring your presence to your lover via PadBot T1 whenever, wherever.
The unique rapid rotary motion from PadBot T1 improves the interaction between you and your pets while you are away.
You will never have to remember to use the wall charger and charging cables for your mobile devices, because simply just plug it in and PadBot T1 will juicy it up for you.
Thanks for the compact size and exquisite design, PadBot T1 can be easily carried around in briefcases.
The Auto-Answering function comes with PadBot App, will automatically establish a secured connection to PadBot T1 while no one at home so you can patrol around your property to make sure everything is in order.
We are new, we are small but we are more open. Join us with the FREE SDK for both Android and iOS developments. PadBot T1 will be your start point of the unlimited opportunities.
  As shown above, pluging a mobile device into PadBot T1 is easy. PadBot T1 relies on inserted device for controlling and communications.
PadBot T1 uses Bluetooth 4.0 to communicate with attached mobile device after PadBot App has been installed, simply and smartly.
Crawler motion is one of the most important features of PadBot T1, which makes robot move smoothly.
The users of PadBot T1 will have the privileges to use our newly developed Global Servers System to make online one-on-one video chat.
It is quite simple to control PadBot T1 using your mobile device remotely with PadBot App installed.
Provided PadBot App will be your best approach to shift moving peed and adjust video resolution.
In order to prevent from falling and collision, PadBot T1 implemented with our unique PadFall system. It is a smart algorithm working intelligently with installed Collision-avoidance sensors and Front/Rear Anti-Falling sensors.
It is important to be user-friendly alongside device-friendly. PadBot T1 can be easily accommodate with both iOS and Android devices using provided adaptors. Meanwhile, the deployed adaptor will start charging your mobile devices as soon as it is coupled.
  PadBot T1 comes with two color, pink rose or space grey.
We proudly make PadBot T1 just a little bigger than a 6 inch cell phone at the size of 6.38 in * 5.16 in * 1.4 in (162mm*131mm*36mm).
PadBot T1 is such a tiny robot. It is a challenge for us to squeeze two motors, one battery, multiple circuit boards and sensors into such a small space inside.
The implemented 13.32Wh Li-ion battery provides PadBot T1 the ability to fully charge an iPhone at least once while the PadBot T1 is active. As a reference, the Battery Capacity of iPhone 6s is 6.34Wh (3.7v/1715mAh).
Battery usage:
Extreme usage (all sensors on, screen on, full speed, video on): 2 hr
Regular usage: 12 hr
Standby          :  100 hr
User Manual
            What is PadBot T1?
PadBot T1 is a micro Virtual + Independent Telepresence Robot. It clones your physical presence when you can't be there in person.
How does PadBot T1 work?
PadBot T1 coupled with an iOS or Android mobile device under Bluetooth 4.0 protocol with PadBot App installed and WiFi/4G enabled. All registered user will be able to invite friends and use our state-of-the-art Global Servers System together for smooth chatting experience.
What languages does PadBot App support？
The Padbot App will be available in 34 different languages.
Will PadBot T1 be able to stop automatically before falling from the edges?
The implemented Anti-Falling System alongside with PadFall algorithm will smartly prevent PadBot T1 falling from the edges.
Is there any collision prevention technology utilized in PadBot T1?
The intelligently build infrared collision prevention system alongside with PadFall algorithm will promptly stop PadBot T1 from moving when human or pets are approaching.
        We are a professional team specialized in designing, developing and producing high quality telepresence robots. With years of real life software developing, hardware designing and mechanical engineering, we feel confident that our expertise will bring you the best telepresence robot.
After over 300 days of designing and developing PadBot T1 from ground up, it is time to wake her up and engage the smart telepresence robot with your everyday life. It will be our honor to witness such a beautiful masterpiece come alive with your support.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The estimated delivery date of PadBot T1 is October, 2016. We have done our best to create a solid production plan based on demand forecasting. But shipping is out of our control, there might be a possibility that shipping will be delayed due to weather or availability. Most importantly, we've learned a lot from launching our first product previously and we will try our best to manage the risk. Should we miss projections, we will keep everyone informed and up to date.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
***IMPORTANT: If you've just arrived here and the project looks sold out/finished, you can still get the "no brainer" package (the digital book and video course & loads of bonuses including 3 webinars and entrance to the secret Facebook group, our most popular package) via Gumroad right now, so no sweat!
>>>>> CLICK HERE TO GET IT NOW! <<<<<
--
Tired of bullsh*t marketing and growth hacking books that don't give you any f***ing idea what you have to do to get users/traffic/revenue?
We are too, so we made this step-by-step guide anyone can use to start growth hacking immediately, using proven strategies we've used ourselves.
Me speaking at Google Campus, London, April 2016
I’m an entrepreneur and one of the creators of the e-book and video course: “Secret Sauce: A step-by-step guide to growth hacking”, along with growth hacker and my co-author, Austen Allred.
 The truth is that marketing is pretty easy once someone tells you what you should be doing. The only problem is that no-one wants do that.
There’s too much money in consulting and selling books about the veneer without ever giving up the actual secret sauce.
“This book and video course won’t be like that. In fact, they’ll be very different from that, and probably nothing like what you’re used to. Here’s why: Secret Sauce is not so much a book as it is a tutorial.
Secret Sauce is a step-by-step, systematic dismantling and dissection of every channel and practice that actually works, laid out one after another. It’s a guide that will handhold you all the way to getting traffic, users, and revenue.
Our goal with this book and course is that someone who knows absolutely nothing about marketing could sit down, follow the instructions, and make what they’re doing blow up. We’ve done this before - a lot.
Our combined efforts account for millions of monthly pageviews, millions of social followers, millions of emails, millions of dollars in revenue -- no matter how you slice it, this stuff just works. We’ve tried hundreds of growth hacks in order to give you only the methods we know will work.
Most everything you’ll read is something anyone can do with a little bit of effort, and which requires very little (or zero) marketing budget.
By the time you finish this book, you will not only have a dozen ideas about different strategies that can help your idea succeed, but you’ll know exactly what it takes to implement each one of them.
After you read this book you will be able to sell units of and get users signed up for literally anything.
What you’ll find in the growth hacking playbook works.
I was on welfare/benefits 3 years ago, and used growth hacking techniques to get millions of visitors to websites I created and raise hundreds of thousands of dollars in investment, and got into the Techstars accelerator. I then launched a growth hacking agency and have used these techniques to move hundreds of thousands of people to websites, and acquire tonnes of users and followers for startups.
Speaking in London, England, Winter 2015
A key change in my life happened a year ago. An accelerator had heard I was a “growth hacker” and asked me to give a talk to their current teams. I put together a slide deck of what I considered the basics, and gave a presentation. Halfway through my talk I realised half of the room was taking pages of notes, while the others stared at me in disbelief. The minute my talk finished, founders ran up to me asking for my slides and if I did consulting. I was surprised- I hadn’t seen many people in marketing give talks and presumed you were meant to give practical advice and show people how to do things, pieces of software you can use to automate things, etc. this was not the case. I gave more talks and it’s an incredible feeling how much people find my talks useful. That’s where the idea for this book came from. Give as many people practical, actionable advice and strategies as possible. My growth hacking talk was eventually voted best workshop of SXSW V2V 2015. Earlier this year I gave a 30-date speaking tour of America, and am so excited to get this knowledge out there in full for the first time.
This is the first time I’m pulling back the curtain and unveiling my secrets, along with my co-author Austen Allred, who has moved millions of visitors and dollars through growth hacking across every channel from SEO to Pinterest and everything inbetween.
What you’ll discover in Secret Sauce can be used for good or evil. It is very powerful stuff. Right now, only a few people know how to do these things. We’re blowing the whistle on the tactics other people are using, and handing you the tools to do them yourself, and find your secret sauce.
And with that substantial word of warning, we launch our kickstarter. If this book gets funded, it will be available very soon after the Kickstarter ends (like, by the end of June or mid-July at the very latest). We’re not sure what the blowback is going to be as no-one has done a book like this before. If you’ve ever read a marketing book and found it didn’t contain enough specific strategies to try, the growth hacking playbook is for you. If you work in marketing and want to use new techniques to boost your companies brand and get promoted, this book is for you. And if you run your own company, you are going to adore this book.
Secret Sauce will give you the tools you need to execute growth hacking strategies in a wide range of environments—but I have another goal in sharing it with you. 
As many have pointed out to me, I could keep this information to myself and make more money from clients- but I truly believe we’re all better off if we share the knowledge and grow our companies together. As such, everyone who donates anything will be invited into a private growth hacking group on Facebook, where we’ll create an ongoing community to help each other with our digital marketing and startup growth problems. I wish there had been a group like this when I was on welfare and starting out on my company three years ago, rather than having to learn it all by trial and error. There’ll be no links or spam in the group, just questions, answers, and discussions from and to the community around this area which has so little useful information. This will make sure that the learning will continue after the campaign ends.
Those of you who have followed me for a while know that when give a talk, I love to go big—ridiculously big—in offering as much value as possible.
We’ve created several different backer reward levels with lots of rewards for each bracket.
Tier 1 “GROWTH HACKER” will receive:
A digital copy of the seven-part growth hacking book.
- Entrance to the secret growth hackers’ club on Facebook
- Thank you page in the book. Exclusive content and backer updates
THE "NO BRAINER" PACKAGE
The best package we're doing. Get this package for an insane amount of bonuses and content:
- A digital copy of the seven-part growth hacking book 
- Entrance to the secret growth hackers’ club on Facebook 
- A voucher for the 20+ hour Udemy course walking you through the book, including screencasts so you can follow step-by-step how to perform many of the strategies we talk about in the book. The video course will be sold on Udemy, 3 courses for a total value of $150
- 1x ticket to a free webinar (including Q & A) with Vincent Dignan “Growth hack your content marketing strategy” value $99 
- 1x free webinar (including Q & A) with Vincent Dignan “How to get rich and internet famous (Hacking sales and personal branding)” value $99 
- 1x ticket to a free webinar (including Q & A) with Vincent Dignan “Growth Hacking live: Boost your startup in real-time” (updated version of the talk which was voted best at SXSW V2V 2015) - value $99 
- Entrance to private Q & A with authors Austen Allred and Vincent Dignan 
- Thank you page in the book 
- A special “What we learned from our Kickstarter campaign” Google Hangout (or some similar platform) with both authors, Vincent Dignan and Austen Allred - A Kickstarter exclusive “Kickstarter: Behind the Scenes/What we learned” mini eBook.
Tier 3 “Masters” (very limited numbers) will receive the below:
EVERYTHING in the“Serious about growth” package plus: 
- 1 or 4 Growth hacking brainstorm/sessions from Vincent Dignan via Skype, pending the package chosen 
- An audit of your website/app, social channels and SEO by Vincent Dignan Social media shoutouts to over 100,000 people on Twitter EVERYTHING in the“Serious about growth” package.
Tier 5 (very, very limited numbers) will receive:
FULL DAY WITH VINCENT DIGNAN (UK/Europe ONLY) Package:
This is UBER limited. Only 5 will ever exist.
Spend a FULL day with Vincent Dignan (10am to 6pm) SOLO, meaning no one else, just you and Vincent Dignan in your offices with your team. Build a growth engine, discuss community management techniques, create a full content marketing strategy, learn how to completely automate your social media processes, anything!

campaign.story:
What is Pillarhub?
Pillarhub offers a unique and innovative approach to mobile computing - two portable 15 inch HD screens allow you to instantly increase your screen real estate, improving productivity and visibility. It is quick and easy to set up, connecting to your computer via a single USB 3 or USB C cable.
Pillarhub does not require a separate power source. It draws power from your laptop via the same USB cable use to connect the screens, allowing you the freedom to use it anywhere and anytime. The slim, padded carry case makes transporting Pillarhub easy and safe while the simple, sleek design means you can use it with any style of computer and it can fit right alongside your laptop in your carry bag.
Introducing Pillarhub
Pillarhub comes with USB 3 and USB C compatibility
Our Story
The Pillarhub team got together over the common frustration of find a truly portable monitor that was slim enough to not add too much extra bulk over the laptop. We were all fed up with fiddling with software or working with half hearted solutions. There was no one product or solution that we could take with us while traveling. After the frustrations cleared, we got our heads together and came up with the following checklist that would make the perfect solution for us:
It needs to be light and portable
It needed a good screen
It needed to run with no power cables (or ability to charge)
It needed to fit into my laptop bag
With that in mind we got to work and went through a few iterations before settling on a 2 screen system. There was always a fear that the second screen would add too much bulk and would make the product non-viable. We worked with our manufactures to chip away at the weight and slim down the panel until we are now confident that the added bulk is no longer a compromise.
We’ve since worked with a dozen manufactures to ensure the high quality of our panels and spend countless hours on the 3D printer prototyping parts to finalize Pillarhub. We believe that the powerless setup was a big leap and we are proud to share the Pillarhub product with the world. Help us spread the word so we can showcase our product to the world. Thank you for supporting us!
Working on our Prototype
Engineering team working on an early prototpye

After countless hours of design, engineering, and working with a dozen manufactures, we are ready to start production. We do not anticipate any major hurdles or obstacles and should be able to ship Pillarhub by Late 2016 to Early 2017.

updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
Thanks so much for all your continued support.
Just wanted to address some comments that have mentioned that we are using rebranded screens. For those of you who are familiar with large-scale electronic manufacturing(molds, wiring, inputs, etc); there are often overlaps from facilities which produce for multiple brands (e.g. Ho Hai Precision industry (trading as FoxConn) manufacturing for Apple at facilities that are not wholly owned by Apple; thus Ho Hai makes devices for multiple Chinese brands beyond Apple and often phones are using similar if not identical technologies.) This is similar to our case, as we do not have the resources to setup a screen manufacturing facility in China, so contacted many facilities in an effort to find a solution that met our needs; often which have overlap such as using similar tapered design, brightness controls, etc. that will work with our custom 3D stands.)

WOW!!! We are beyond overwhelmed with excitement and very appreciative of our supporters who quadrupled our funding goal this morning. We couldn't have imagined exceeding our goal this quickly and want to thank each one of our early supporters, you guys are awesome!
We will be in touch with more updates & information very soon. Have a great start to your week everyone!

We want to wish all of our early supporters a safe, relaxing and fun Memorial Day Weekend! We cannot express how excited we are about the outpouring of support and pledges. We could not have imagined exceeding our goal and then some so fast. 
We THANK YOU and are still working on getting more answers out to your questions. We appreciate your patience and hope everyone enjoys the weekend.
- Pillar Hub Team
